data.name: Exo-Adventures
data.detailed_description:
Join the exploration in this fast-paced space platformer video game. Take control of your astronaut as you explore and clear out sectors of hostile exoplanets.

Key Features/Details
- Beamed down onto the surface of a hostile planet your goal is to reach the end of each zone.
- Quick and responsive movement combined with your rocket boosters, which allow for multiple jumps, provide a fast pace and action-packed gameplay experience.
- When you first beam down you will have a small shield. This can protect you for a short time and when it runs out you will start to take damage to your health.
- You start your mission with 3 re-links. These allow you to teleport back to the start of the zone or to an activated re-link station when your health reaches critical levels.
- Be on the lookout for both med-packs and extra re-links scattered across the surface. These will greatly increase your chances of survival!
- Avoid dangerous alien life and hazardous terrain so you can make it to the end in one piece.
- An experience that is both challenging and fun, how quickly can you make it to the end?

data.short_description: Join the exploration in this fast-paced space platformer video game. Take control of your astronaut as you explore and clear out sectors of hostile exoplanets.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.4 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 1536 MB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Listed specs are approximate.
